description: Tool for creating hemispheric cutting planes and filling white matter for surface tessellation.

xform_name.title: Xform Name
xform_name.description: Use xform dst offset to get an accurate Talairach volume

segmentation_file.title: Segmentation File
segmentation_file.description: ASEG volume used to perform fill

atlas_file.title: Atlas File
atlas_file.description: Specify atlas to use for auto-filling

seed_cc_tal.title: Corpus Callosum Seed Talairach
seed_cc_tal.description: Talairach coords of the seed for the corpus callosum (three numerical values required)

seed_pons_tal.title: Pons Seed Talairach
seed_pons_tal.description: Talairach coords of the seed for the pons (three numerical values required)

seed_lh_tal.title: Left Hemisphere Seed Talairach
seed_lh_tal.description: Talairach coords of the white matter seed for the left hemisphere (three numerical values required)

seed_rh_tal.title: Right Hemisphere Seed Talairach
seed_rh_tal.description: Talairach coords of the white matter seed for the right hemisphere (three numerical values required)

seed_cc_vox.title: Corpus Callosum Seed Voxel
seed_cc_vox.description: Voxel coords of the seed for the corpus callosum (three numerical values required)

seed_pons_vox.title: Pons Seed Voxel
seed_pons_vox.description: Voxel coords of the seed for the pons (three numerical values required)

auto_man_files.title: Auto Man Files
auto_man_files.description: Get edits based on the difference between auto and man and apply to the output

pointset_args.title: Pointset Arguments
pointset_args.description: Stand-alone option: takes one or more pointsets and fills in all the voxels that intersect lines connecting any two points within a given point set

ctab_file.title: Color Table File
ctab_file.description: Embed color table in the output
